markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Psychopomp](/Traits.aspx?ID=232)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 347</row>

A family of monitors spawned within the [Boneyard](/Planes.aspx?ID=14) to convey souls to the Outer Planes, most psychopomps are true neutral. They typically have darkvision, lifesense, and spirit touch, and they are immune to death effects.
name: Psychopomp
